data.text: @moonbeamluna1 @wsbtv @KevinProbably Tina you are so correct.  I agree with you, if a person has a problem why can’t they go directly to the person to see if can be corrected.  Is there anything wrong with direct communication. Just saying

@wsbtv @KevinProbably Why is it when weren’t happy we put it on the page for all to see. It just takes a few minutes to call the owner of the restaurant and discuss what had actually happened.  Respect goes both ways.

@wsbtv @KevinProbably This is ridiculous. She can call out who she wants, but when they responded... she went all Diva on them. Uncalled for! Don’t let the screen door hit your ass on the way out of the South! #LeslieWho
